text: aur hum ne un ke piche isa bin maryam ko bheja jo apne se pehle ki kitab yani taurath ki tasdiq karne wale thein aur hum ne unhe injeel ata farmai jis mein noor aur hidayath thi aur wo apne se pehle ki kitab taurath ki tasdiq karti thi aur wo saraâ€™sar hidayath wa nasihath thi paarsa8 logo ke liye
